comment._content:
I used to stay in Helnan Shepheard Hotel Cairo in 1999.
I wodered it's the same one?

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Hi bufangkelly - I found the hotel history page here looks like the original burned in 1952 and the one you stayed at is a newer structure. ~shelley

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Record corrected with help from frostback1 via this photo. Per our researcher here, various websites seem to interchange Shepherd and Shepheard when referring to this hotel, but the hotel was named after its first manager, Samuel Shepheard. See sites: www.right-travel.com/hotels www.bbc.co.uk/history/ancient/egyptians/death_sakkara_gal...
